title: $:/plugins/tiddlywiki/codemirror-mode-css
author: tiddlywiki
name: CodeMirror Mode CSS
readme: This plugin adds Syntax Highlighting for CSS tiddlers (text/css) to the [[CodeMirror|http://codemirror.net]] text editor. It needs the latest [[CodeMirror plugin|$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/codemirror]] to be installed
